questions.prompt: Full legal name for the primary cardholder?
Do they have an existing card number (for upgrades or replacements)?
List any household members to add (name per person).
questions.notes: Repeat for each additional reader, if any.

questions.prompt: Email for each additional reader (if different).

items.prompt: Spell back the primary cardholder's name.
Verify the contact email or capture an alternative channel.
Recap the household additions or note that there are none.
Explain ID verification requirements and seek approval to issue the card(s).

confirmation.default_closing_line: Remind them about pickup verification and temporary PIN expiry.
